column4: UNOP: in the way to connect internet, I set the LAN card in ENABLE ROAMING mode. When I disable this card, the other card (regional LAN) is worked normally..
But when I enabled the internat LAN card, I can not reach other regional server anymore..
Sounds like you need a static route to the regional servers out the regional server interface?
can you do   ifconfig -a ; netstat -nr and put the output on pastebin... ah, same idea as unop
